articles.author: Nehal Chaliawala
articles.title: EV Push: FAME-II scheme achieves just 10% target with 4 months left in original deadline - Economic Times
articles.description: Data shared by the ministry of heavy industries under the Right to Information Act, 2005, show about Rs 509 crore were given as subsidies for electric two-, three- and four-wheelers while buses got subsidies worth Rs 310 crore as of October 9.
articles.content: The Indian government's flagship electric vehicles (EV) promotion scheme FAME-II has so far disbursed just under 10% of the Rs 8,596 crore earmarked to be given as purchase subsidies with just four m… [+2820 chars]

articles.author: Sameer Contractor
articles.title: Volkswagen Pulls The Plug On The Tiguan AllSpace And T-Roc SUVs In India - CarandBike
articles.description: The Volkswagen Tiguan AllSpace and T-Roc arrived in India as completely built units. The former is now being replaced by the five-seater Tiguan that will be locally assembled in the country. The T-Roc could return in 2022 in the facelifted avatar.
articles.content: Volkswagen has discontinued the Tiguan AllSpace and the T-Roc SUVs in India. The automaker silently pulled the plug on the Tiguan AllSpace seven-seater offering a few weeks ago and it has now been re… [+3011 chars]

articles.title: RBI's New Bank Ownership Rule a Victory for Uday Kotak, IndusInd Bank. See Why - News18
articles.description: Kotak Mahindra Bank managing director Uday Kotak does not have to sell his 26 per cent stake of the bank after the RBI's New Bank Ownership Rule.

articles.description: It has upgraded the ACT Max 500 with a 1,000GB data limit (from 500GB earlier) with 40Mbps speed, the ACT Max 700 and ACT Max 1075 both have been upgraded to unlimited data with 75Mbps

articles.author: Shubham Raj
articles.title: Sovereign gold bond issue open from today: Should you subscribe? - Economic Times
articles.description: Investment in sovereign gold bonds has picked up pace in recent months. However, lack of clarity on how gold will move in the coming months may keep investors cautious. If prices drop, it will be better to subscribe at a later tranche.
